n. 接近，入口
","usphone":"'æksɛs","remMethod":"ac ＋ cess(去) → 来去要走通道 → 通道","picture":"http://ydschool-online.nos.netease.com/CET4luan_1_1_access_1523504930159000002_access_JY.png","phrases":"access control: 访问控制

","sentences":"Users can access their voice mail remotely.
^^用户可以远程获取语音邮件。^^
Access to the papers is restricted to senior management.
^^只有高级管理层才有权查阅这些文件。^^

n.

","synos":"vt.

进入；使用权；[电]通路：opening, admittance
","realExamSentences":"...This process improves access to relevant information...
^^2017.6 CET4 第二套 阅读理解^^
...in part because of my inability to access the information as quickly...
^^2017.12 CET4 undefined 阅读理解^^
...Department of Education is making efforts to ensure that all students have equal access to a quality education...
^^2015.6 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...assume that people consciously and rationally choose what and how much they eat and therefore focus on providing information and more access to heal thier foods...
^^2015.6 CET4 第三套 阅读理解^^
...Today's announcement is another important step forward in improving access to a quality education...
^^2015.6 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...access to public housing...
^^2015.12 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...smartphones and　other devices into the hands of medical staff for instant access to patient data...
^^2014.6 CET4 第二套 阅读理解^^
...the technology　has helped reduce medical error by providing instant access to patient data or prescription details...
^^2014.6 CET4 第二套 阅读理解^^
...largely because they no longer had access to affordable health care...
^^2014.12 CET4 第二套 阅读理解^^
...Perhaps the most profound changes will come when the five billion people worldwide who currently lack Internet access get online...
^^2014.12 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...Over two billion people worldwide now have access to vastly more information than ever before...
^^2014.12 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...That means users have access to notes from not only their classmates and Facebook friends...
^^2013.6 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...To access your rights under the DDA and to request "reasonable adjustments" to your working conditions or your workplace requires disclosure...
^^2012.12 CET4 第三套 阅读理解^^
...Yet he also empowered millions of people by giving them access to cutting-edge technology...
^^2012.12 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...online customers have access to commodities of such a huge variety and number...
^^2011.6 CET4 undefined 写作题^^
...A US study suggested that when a school gave children access to a natural environment...
^^2010.12 CET4 undefined 阅读理解^^
...The life of old people is measurably better when they have access to nature...
^^2010.12 CET4 undefined 阅读理解^^
...Only with free access to this live 'database’...
^^2009.6 CET4 undefined 写作题^^
...With access to the Internet...
^^2008.6 CET4 undefined 写作题^^

control strategy: 控制策略

management strategy: 管理战略；治理策略；决策管理

learning strategy: 学习策略

overall strategy: 全面战略
corporate strategy: 公司策略

","sentences":"the government’s long-term economic strategy
^^政府的长期经济策略^^
a company’s business strategy
^^公司的经营策略^^
","relWords":"adj.

","synos":"n.
[军]战略，策略：device, tactic
","realExamSentences":"...have a clear strategy for dealing with angry owners—they look away...
^^2017.6 CET4 undefined 听力题^^

^^2015.6 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^
...Burger King's promotional strategy of offering low-priced items often proved ineffective...
^^2015.6 CET4 第一套 阅读理解^^

^^2015.6 CET4 第三套 阅读理解^^
...Underwriters Laboratories’ chief strategy officer...
^^2012.12 CET4 第二套 阅读理解^^
